sentences.chinese: 燕齊之閒皆為欒布立社，號曰欒公社。
sentences.literal: Yan Qi between all for Luan Bu established shrines, styled Luan Gong shrines.
sentences.idiomatic: Between Yan and Qi, all established shrines for Luan Bu, calling them the Luan Gong shrines.

sentences.literal: Jing Emperor middle fifth year passed away.
sentences.idiomatic: He passed away in the fifth year of Emperor Jing's reign.

sentences.chinese: 子賁嗣，為太常，犧牲不如令，國除。
sentences.literal: Son Ben succeeded, served as Grand Master of Ceremonies, sacrifices not according to regulations, fief eliminated.
sentences.idiomatic: His son Ben succeeded him and served as Grand Master of Ceremonies, but his sacrifices did not conform to regulations, so his fief was eliminated.

sentences.chinese: 太史公曰：以項羽之氣，而季布以勇顯於楚，身屨（典）軍搴旗者數矣，可謂壯士。
sentences.literal: Grand Historian said: With Xiang Yu's spirit, yet Ji Bu with bravery prominent in Chu, personally led troops seized banners several times, can be called stalwart warrior.
sentences.idiomatic: The Grand Historian said: With Xiang Yu's spirit, Ji Bu nonetheless became prominent in Chu through bravery, personally leading troops and seizing enemy banners on several occasions—he can truly be called a stalwart warrior.

sentences.chinese: 然至被刑戮，為人奴而不死，何其下也！
sentences.literal: However to suffered punishment execution, became person's slave yet not died, how lowly!
sentences.idiomatic: Yet to suffer punishment and execution, become someone's slave and not die—how lowly this was!

sentences.chinese: 彼必自負其材，故受辱而不羞，欲有所用其未足也，故終為漢名將。
sentences.literal: He certainly self-relied on his talents, therefore accepted humiliation without shame, wished to have use for his insufficiency, therefore finally became Han famous general.
sentences.idiomatic: He certainly relied upon his own talents, therefore accepted humiliation without feeling shame, wishing to have some use for what was still insufficient, and therefore finally became a famous general of Han.

sentences.literal: Worthy ones truly value their death.
sentences.idiomatic: Truly, the worthy value their death.

sentences.chinese: 夫婢妾賤人感慨而自殺者，非能勇也，其計畫無復之耳。
sentences.literal: Indeed concubines base people emotionally moved commit suicide, not able brave, their plans no recovery only.
sentences.idiomatic: Indeed, when concubines and base people are emotionally moved and commit suicide, it is not that they are able to be brave—their plans simply have no recovery.

sentences.chinese: 欒布哭彭越，趣湯如歸者，彼誠知所處，不自重其死。
sentences.literal: Luan Bu wept Peng Yue, hurried to cauldron as returning home, he truly knew his situation, not self-valued his death.
sentences.idiomatic: Luan Bu wept for Peng Yue and hurried to the cauldron as if returning home—he truly knew his situation and did not value his own death.

sentences.literal: Even past ancient fierce warriors, how to add!
sentences.idiomatic: Even the fierce warriors of past and ancient times—what could be added to this!
